title: Before the Workshop
text: In preparation for the workshop, please make sure the following programs are installed and read through the following materials.

title: Before the Workshop
text:
Programs to install
R https://www.r-project.org/
RStudio from the Posit website https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/
Rtools this will be important for building certain packages https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/
Git https://git-scm.com/downloads
GitHub desktop https://github.com/apps/desktop
